text: Khoa Tran (; January 21, 1997) is a Vietnamese-American professional basketball player for the Nha Trang Dolphins of the VBA and the Saigon Heat of the Asean Basketball League. He is also known as "Mr. Wiggle" in Vietnam. His favorite NBA basketball player is Kevin Durant. ==Pro career== ===Saigon Heat (2016–present)=== With the formation for the Vietnam Basketball Association, Khoa joined the Saigon Heat side for the league's inaugural season.
